attributes.action: Great Britain needs to stop All immigration to this country
attributes.additional_details:
This country is already over full, we don't have enough jobs or houses to satisfy the needs of the people who are already here, our NHS cannot cope, our infrastucture is breaking down, the roads are clogged up, we don't need to bring any more people into our, over full, country.

We urgently need to stop all immigration for a period of 5 years, including people from the EEC, we can then re evaluate and adjust if necessary.
